adjective.description: Of or relating to the phylum Echiura, or to the family Echiuridae.

noun.description: An animal of the phylum Echiura, or of the family Echiuridae.

origin: Late 19th century; earliest use found in American Naturalist. From scientific Latin Echiurus + -id, after either French échiurides, or scientific Latin Echiuridae, family name, and, in later use, Echiurida, group name.
